name: Tales of Monkey Island: Chapter 5 - Rise of the Pirate God

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files/Telltale Games/Tales of Monkey Island/Rise of the Pirate God/MonkeyIsland105.exe

files.game: N/A:Please select the Telletale (Download Center) Windows installer.

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Please select the Telletale (Download Center) Windows installer.
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Telltale Games/Tales of Monkey Island/Rise of the Pirate
    God/MonkeyIsland105.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dx9
    description: Installing d3dx9
    name: winetricks
